alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:29AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Aitkin, northwestern Pine, southwestern Carlton and southeastern Crow Wing Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 928 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Garrison, to 10 miles northwest of Brook Park, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aitkin, Rutledge, Moose Lake, Willow River and Kettle River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin
